subject: p19028690
Findings: Cardiac size is top normal. Right lower lobe opacity could be due to atelectasis but superimposed infection cannot be excluded in the appropriate clinical setting. Widened mediastinum is unchanged from. There is no pneumothorax or large pleural effusion.
